question.statement: Which statements are true about C#'s DateTime type?
question.answerContent: 0;Can contain dates AD and BC~0~Is stored as a 32-bit integer~0~Is stored as a 64-bit integer~1~Can represent date and time up to a nanosecond~0;Can only represent date and time up to 10 nanoseconds~0~Can only represent date and time up to 100 nanoseconds~1~
